title: Understanding 3D Maps and Power Map
text: 3D Maps and Power Map are often used interchangeably in Excel. They both refer to the same feature that allows users to visualize data in a three-dimensional space.

title: Features of 3D $$\frac{Maps}{Power}$$ Map
text: Both 3D Maps and Power Map can create geographical regions and animations. They are powerful tools for visualizing data over time and space.

title: Confirming the Answer
text: Based on the features of 3D Maps and Power Map, what can you conclude about their differences?
choices: Power Map can create geographical regions, but not animations
3D Map can create geographical regions, but not animations
